medium: Tempera and oil on wood panel
creditline: Gift of H. Kelley Rollings, Class of 1948, and Mrs. Rollings, in memory of Mr. Rolling's parents, Harry and Elizabeth Rollings

texts.textentryhtml: Erbach collection, Fürstenau; A.S. Drey, Munich (in 1927); Van Diemen Gallery, Berlin (by 1929-1935; sale, Paul Graupe, Berlin, April 26-27, 1935, lot 52, to Panofsky); Alfred M. Panofsky, Tucson, AZ (1935-; to Rollings); H. Kelly Rollings, Tucson, AZ (until 1983; gift to Princeton University Art Museum).
